result.execSummary:
The defendant Wesley J Fergus was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC AMENDED FROM PCS/THC 2 + OFFENSE, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Wesley J Fergus in court with attorney Bruce A Fishbain.  Jennifer C. Tanck-Adams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Nancy Szeklinski.
Upon plea to Ct 1 amended to misd PCS/THC and Ct 2, the State is not opposed to a fine.
P-NC to both
COP filed, rights given
the deft waives right to JT
the State relies on comp for FB - defense stipulates to same
finding of guilt

BTC: guilty. Ct 1-$200 + cc, DNA costs- FTP-30 days RCJ
                    Ct 2-cc, DNA costs - FTP-5 days RCJ
PP $100/mo. to begin 10-01-2014.
Status conference scheduled for August 22, 2014 at 09:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on July 18, 2014 at 08:15 am.
Waiver of Preliminary hearing filed.  Probable cause found;  bound over.

Defendant Wesley J Fergus in court with attorney Bruce A Fishbain.  Patricia J Hanson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Lori Thornton.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 18, 2014 at 08:15 am.
Preliminary hearing on June 18, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment. You have been ordered to have your fingerprints/photographs taken as a condition of your bond.  Report to the Sheriff's Department Records Bureau. Hours:  Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Thursday between 9:00 a.m. and 11:00 a.m. or between 1:00 p.m. and 3:00 p.m. The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Wesley J Fergus in court with attorney Bruce A Fishbain.  Robert S Repischak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Lori Thornton.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, bond set.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 18, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 5, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Wesley J Fergus in court.  Noah Wishau appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Lori Thornton. 
BTC: Adj for deft to obtain counsel.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 5, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
